text: Öebbi, ur illi ôebbi siwa Neppa, Amuddir, Imezgi. Ur Ipnuddum, ur Iggan. IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt. Anwa akka ara icufâan $uôeS, siwa ma s tsriê iS? Issen i illan zdat sen, i illan deffir sen. Ur êemûen kra, si tmusni S, siwa ayen i S ihwan. Lewsaâ usgeld iS, d tamurt akked igenwan. Ur T issaâtab uêareb fellasen. Neppa, d Aâlayan, d Ameqwôaêan.
